column1: * Rebellion and division of the Númenóreans begins.
* About this time the Nazgûl or Nazgûl

column2: it said in 2251 "Tar-Atanamir takes the Sceptre of Númenor"
column4: Atanamir died in .  The year 2221 is itself an emendation of 2251
column5: and the former (2221) appears in the later tables
column6: while the latter (2251) in the earlier tables: therefore 2251 (properly 2221) should have read "Death of Tar-Atanamir. Tar-Ancalimon takes the sceptre".
